settings.title: Ingredients
settings.message: All our ingredient-dense formulations are designed to simplify your skincare routine, both to support your barrier function and to reduce the packaging waste caused by the overuse of products. We focus on finding ingredients that are clinically proven while being non-GMO, manufactured in Canada and produced from renewable resources. We’ve applied for the prestigious EWG Certification to demonstrate our commitment to Clean.

settings.title: Packaging
settings.message:
Along with our commitment to reducing packaging waste through synergistic formulations, we have Especially designed our packaging to be BPA free, 100% recyclable and Plastic Neutral. We aim to continue researching ways to both offset and reduce carbon production to go further and reach Plastic Negative.

Learn more about our dedication to sustainability.

settings.title: Our Journey to sustainable
settings.message: As athletes, we enjoy the benefits of our environment with every run, ski and ride. We choose better quality gear from ethical manufacturers, drink from reusable containers and tread lightly when we train. We do this because we’re all trying to make positive changes for a more sustainable future. We acknowledge getting better is a journey, here’s what Lontreau is doing to get there.

settings.heading: Packaging Features
settings.message: Our serums are stability-tested and safely housed in our unique, 100% recyclable airless containers. Instead of using springs, our mono-material technology ensures the entirety of the packaging can be recycled and maintains the integrity of the ingredients by protecting them from oxidization to ensure the longevity and quality of every Lontreau product. The lightweight packaging is designed to be easily thrown into your sports bag so your kit can come with you, wherever you go.

settings.title: No Fuss Formulations
settings.heading: Our synergistic formulations are designed to simplify your skincare routine. Every step in the Lontreau Core Kit can be pumped directly into your hand, emulsified and applied all at once. Skip the multi-step routine and focus on science-backed ingredients that get you on the move, faster.
